scripts.dev: docker compose down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.dev:api: cd packages/hermes-api && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.format: pnpm --filter hermes-app lint:fix && cd packages/hermes-api && uv run black app/ tests/ && uv run isort app/ tests/
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter hermes-app lint && cd packages/hermes-api && uv run ruff check app/ tests/
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter hermes-app lint:fix && cd packages/hermes-api && uv run ruff check --fix app/ tests/
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter hermes-app test:coverage && cd packages/hermes-api && uv run pytest --cov=app --cov-report=html --cov-report=term
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean && docker compose down -v && rm -rf data/data/* data/downloads/* data/temp/*
scripts.setup: pnpm install && echo 'Create .env file from .env.example and update values'
scripts.security:generate-key: uv run python3 -c "import secrets; print('HERMES_SECRET_KEY=' + secrets.token_urlsafe(32))"
scripts.security:check: echo 'Checking for potential security issues...' && echo '✓ .env file should not be committed' && echo '✓ Database files are gitignored' && echo '✓ Consider using .dockerignore for production'
scripts.pre-check: pnpm pre-check:api && pnpm pre-check:app && docker compose build
scripts.format:check: cd packages/hermes-api && uv run black --check --diff app/ tests/ && uv run isort --check-only --diff app/ tests/
scripts.pre-check:api: cd packages/hermes-api && uv run black --check app/ tests/ && uv run isort --check-only app/ tests/ && uv run ruff check app/ tests/ && uv run python -m mypy --explicit-package-bases app/ tests/ && uv run pytest
scripts.pre-check:app: pnpm --filter hermes-app lint &&pnpm --filter hermes-app build && pnpm --filter hermes-app type-check && pnpm --filter hermes-app test
scripts.update:all: pnpm update --recursive && cd packages/hermes-api && uv lock --upgrade && uv sync
